title: The Best of The Dan Patrick Show
itunes:title: The Best of The Dan Patrick Show
description:
On today's Dan Patrick Show, DP talks with Golf Channel's Brandel Chamblee on his frustrations with the LIV Golf Tour. Mike Florio checks in with the downsides of the Rams' spending spree. Plus, Jim Jackson talks NBA Finals and shares a story from being teammates with Kobe Bryant.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
content:encoded:
